Conteudo: In light of the macroeconomic scenario and inflation prospects, the Copom decided to reduce the Selic target by 50 basis points to 13.25 percent, without bias. Five votes were for the Copom monetary policy action, while three votes were in favor of reducing the Selic target by 25 basis points.The Portuguese version of the November Copom Minutes will be released next Thursday, December 7.
